description: A hearty pasta bake is the perfect dish to whip up for a family get-together. Try this delicious pesto pasta bake recipe featuring broccoli and chickpeas.
name: Easy Broccoli, Lemon & Chickpea Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g canned chickpeas, rinsed, drained, patted dry with paper towels

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling, salted water for 8 minutes, adding broccoli in the last minute of cooking. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid.

Place cream, pesto, garlic clove, zest, lemon juice and reserved cooking liquid in a large baking dish. Stir to combine. Add pasta, broccoli and spinach, then stir to combine. Scatter over cheese and chickpeas.
Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and crispy on top. Top with mozzarella, drizzle with oil, then serve seasoned with pepper.
